note:
在一个公告中，谷歌解释了Covid-19流行病如何在美国造成粮食危机恶化，这导致了约4500万人 - 或7人中有1人 - 在2020年期间在某些时候经历了粮食不安全。该数字上涨30％公司指出，2019年。其中4500万人，有1500万是儿童。
 虽然大流行的影响是在企业重新开放和恢复的人员正在恢复的情况下，但许多儿童仍将在夏季午餐计划变得无法使用时仍然饥饿。
  为了帮助解决这种需求和与食品不安全相关的其他人，Google的G.co/findfoodsupport提供的新网站提供了食品支持资源的组合，有关美国食品不安全问题的YouTube视频，以及谷歌地图定位器工具将人们直接到他们附近的食物银行或其他食品支持地点。
 谷歌表示，它与组织合作，没有孩子饥饿，食品家庭和美国农业部，以捕获90,000个跨美国国家提供免费食品支持的地方。使用在线工具，网站访问者可以在他们所在地区看到他们的地点，查看学校膳食课程拾取网站，食品银行和食物储藏室。
  该工具将显示位置的地址，电话号码和其他详细信息 - 它是哪个日子，它是营业时间的日子。
 虽然您可以直接在Google地图中找到此信息，但如果您不知道要使用的正确关键字，则可能更加困难。例如，搜索“食品支持”与匹配关键词的业务返回慈善机构，食品银行和公共服务的组合，如“食品狮子”和“Lowe的食物”。寻找“食品援助”更加完整，但也退回了无关的结果，如“美国食品和amp;药物管理。”在线工具的搜索结果将更加精确和准确。
 新网站还突出显示其他食品支持信息，包括快照福利信息;支持特定群体，如老年人，儿童和家庭;国家私有福利指南;和食物支持热线。对于那些未面临食品支持问题的人，它提供有关如何向有需要的人捐款，时间或食物的信息。 
该网站另外，各种各样的国家致力于全国各地发布的YouTube视频，他们正在努力解决自己的社区中的粮食不安全问题。这些视频旨在通过展示所有类型的人使用食物支持 - 包括军事家庭，儿童和老年人，这些视频旨在使用食物不安全。谷歌称，9位现役军人家庭体验粮食不安全，如6名儿童，3名大学生1人，例如超过500万人。
 新网站是谷歌的“食物的好”努力的结果，由艾米莉马领导。最初的食物最初是作为一个早期的Moonshot项目（来自Alphabet的X，以前谷歌[x]），被称为项目三角洲，其专注于创建更智能的食物系统。该团队希望通过更好地将食物指向最需要它的人来寻找垃圾填埋场的方法。 2020年12月，马马宣布的项目三角洲将转向谷歌以扩大其工作。然后，核心团队随后加入了谷歌作为“食物的好”，而食物可追溯性团队仍然在X上致力于更广泛的问题。
 谷歌表示，它将继续向未来的食品定位工具添加更多的食品支持地点，超出今天的90,000件。
note_en:
In an  announcement, Google explains how the Covid-19 pandemic fueled a worsening food crisis in the U.S., which led to some 45 million people — or 1 in 7 Americans — experiencing food insecurity at some point during 2020. That figure was up 30% over 2019, the company noted. And of those 45 million people, 15 million were children.
 While the pandemic’s impacts are starting subside as businesses are reopening and in-person activities are resuming, many children will still go hungry during the summer months when school lunch programs become unavailable.
  To help address this need and others related to food insecurity, Google’s new website available at  g.co/findfoodsupport offers a combination of food support resources, YouTube videos about the problem of food insecurity in the U.S., and a Google Maps locator tool that will direct people to their nearby food bank or other food support locations.
 Google says it worked with organizations including No Kid Hungry, FoodFinder, and the U.S. Department of Agriculture to capture 90,000 places offering free food support across the 50 U.S. states. Using the online tool, website visitors can type in their location to see school meal program pickup sites, food banks and food pantries in their area.
  The tool will display the location’s address, phone number and other details — like which days it’s open or business hours.
 Although you can find this information in Google Maps directly, it can be more difficult if you don’t know the right keywords to use. For example, a search “food support” returned a combination of charities, food banks and public services alongside businesses with matching keywords, like “Food Lion” and “Lowe’s Foods.” A search for “food assistance” was more complete, but also returned unrelated results, like the “US Food & Drug Administration.” The online tool’s search results will be more precise and accurate.
 The new website also highlights other food support information, including SNAP benefit information; support for specific groups, like seniors, children, and families; state-by-state benefit guidelines; and food support hotlines. For those not facing food support issues, it offers information on how to donate money, time or food to those in need.
 The site additionally features a handful of YouTube videos published by organizations across the country who are working to address food insecurity issues in their own communities. The videos aim to destigmatize food insecurity by showing how all types of people use food support — including military families, children, and seniors. Google says 1 in 9 active-duty military families experience food insecurity, as do 1 in 6 children, 1 in 3 college students, and over 5 million seniors, for example.
 The new site is the result of an effort by Google’s “Food for Good,” headed by  Emily Ma. Food for Good originally began as an early stage moonshot project (from Alphabet’s X, formerly Google[x])  known as Project Delta, which focused on creating a smarter food system. The team wanted to find ways to keep food waste out of landfills by better directing food to those who need it most. In December 2020, Ma  announced Project Delta would be moving to Google to scale up its work. The core team then joined Google as “Food for Good,” while the food traceability team remained at X to work on broader issues.
 Google says it will continue to add more food support locations to the food locator tool going forward, beyond the 90,000 it offers today.
title: 谷歌推出了一家网站，为斗争不安全斗争，汇集了90k的地方提供免费食品支持，谷歌地图定位工具等等
title_en: Google launches a website for people struggling with food insecurity, aggregating 90K places offering free food support, a Google Maps locator tool, and more

note:
微软正在宣布Windows 11的下一个版本的Office将拥有本机64位ARM版本，可提高大型或图像填充的文档的性能，并支持64位加载项。新版本的办公室目前处于Beta，可供办公室内部人员使用。
 微软还宣布了办公室的重新设计，您可以在上面和下面看到。虽然它使用类似的设计到Windows 11，但是无论您是＆＃39;重新运行Windows 11预览或Windows 10。除了新的设计外，Office还将适应您的Windows光/黑暗模式，所以您应该能够避免打开文件的经验，并在晚上将其爆炸到眼睛中。
   微软并没有避开有关Windows 11的手臂11.其支持的CPU的有争议的列表包括少量Qualcomm芯片，它使用ARM-WORDICED SCERE PRO X显示其新操作系统的平板电脑功能。对于那些有臂机的人来说，它可能是一个好的标志 - 拥有原生应用可能比仿真更有效，并提供更好的性能。
 然而，它可能有点尴尬，这需要花费这么长时间，对于64位武器版本来到Windows  -  M1 Mac去年年底才有一个原生版本。 Microsoft Perions Haven＆＃39; T来自Office的胳膊版，虽然它是预期的，但它鉴于目前在Beta。
 除了在Office Insider计划之外，那些想要在其ARM Windows机器上测试64位办公室的人还必须运行Windows 11 Insider预览。他们也必须卸载任何32位版本的Office，在重新安装Office之前可能已安装并更新到Beta版本。如果您在Windows 10或11上运行Office Beta，则应能够在Word，Excel，PowerPoint或OneNote中从即将推出的即将到来的窗格中重新设计。
note_en:
Microsoft is announcing that the next version of Office for Windows 11 will have a native 64-bit Arm version, for improved performance on large or picture-filled documents, and support for 64-bit add-ins. The new version of Office is currently in beta, available to  Office Insiders.
 Microsoft also announced  a redesign of Office, which you can see above and below. While it uses a similar design to Windows 11, it’ll be available whether you're running the Windows 11 Preview or Windows 10. In addition to the new design, Office will also adapt to your Windows light / dark mode, so you should be able to avoid the experience of opening a document and having it blast light into your eyes at night.
   Microsoft hasn’t shied away from talking about Arm with Windows 11. Its  contentious list of supported CPUs  includes a handful of Qualcomm chips, and it  used the Arm-powered Surface Pro X to show off the tablet capabilities of its new OS. For those with Arm machines, it’s probably a good sign — having native apps is likely going to be more efficient than emulation, and provide better performance.
 It is, however, perhaps a little awkward that it took so long for a 64-bit Arm version of Office to come to Windows —  M1 Macs got a native version late last year. There are also a few features that Microsoft mentions haven't come to the Arm version of Office yet, though that’s to be expected given that it’s currently in beta.
 In addition to being in the Office Insider program, those who want to test out 64-bit Office on their Arm Windows machine will also have to be running  the Windows 11 Insider Preview. They’ll also have to uninstall any 32-bit versions of Office they may have installed before reinstalling Office and updating to the beta version. If you’re running the Office beta on either Windows 10 or 11, you should be able to turn the redesign on from the Coming Soon pane in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or OneNote.
title: Microsoft宣布为Office重新设计，并表示Windows 11版本将拥有本机64位ARM版本并支持64位加载项
title_en: Microsoft announces a redesign for Office and says Windows 11 version will have a native 64-bit Arm version and support for 64-bit add-ins

note:
如果您从Verge链接购买的内容，Vox Media可能会获得佣金。看看我们的道德声明。
 Microsoft今天正在发布其第一个Windows 11预览版本。 Windows Insiders现在可以下载Windows 11预览（Build 22000.51），其中包括访问新的开始菜单，多任务功能和过修的Microsoft Store。与以前的Windows 11泄漏不同，此官方预览还具有更新的文件资源管理器，可以使用命令栏替换功能栏以简化文件管理。
 大多数Windows 11上周透露Microsoft显示的可视变化将在此初始预览中使用。新的开始菜单与其居中的Launcher样界面是此构建的一部分，在整个操作系统中围绕圆角，并改进通知中心，音量飞口等。如果您的PC有加速度计，则Windows 11 Lock屏幕还将包括视差运动效果。
   Windows 11的新主题和黑暗/光模式改进也是如此预览的一部分，以及新的小部件功能。所有的新主题 - 焕发，捕获的运动，日出和流动 - 铭刻着中心的任务栏设计，Microsoft在您使用操作系统时将它们耦合在Windows 11中的新声音。
 虽然缺少两个大型Windows 11功能：Windows上的Microsoft团队集成和Android应用程序。两者仍然由Microsoft开发和测试，但将出现在稍后的预览版本中。
   此Windows 11预览还包括Microsoft的新捕捉组和捕捉布局功能，以改善各种屏幕尺寸的多任务处理。这些新的Snap功能在Windows中的大量众多多任务功能构建，但使其更容易发现和更有用 - 特别是在多个监视器方案中。
 Microsoft还在大修Windows 11的设置部分。此预览版本包括更改，使其更容易导航并找到所需的设置。设置现在具有左侧导航面板，始终持续，使其更快地切换部分。 Microsoft在顶部建立了新的“英雄”控件，可快速访问与每个部分相关的信息或设置。 
沿着Windows 11今天预览时，Microsoft还释放了Windows 11的Office刷新的预览。更新的UI包括Office应用程序中的圆角，以匹配Windows 11以及对黑暗和灯光模式如何变化的变化。
 如果您有兴趣测试Windows 11预览版本，则需要注册Windows内部程序程序，然后导航到设置＆gt;更新＆amp;安全＆gt; Windows 10设备上的Windows Insider程序，以启用DEV通道并获取Windows 11构建。
 您需要一个兼容的机器，虽然Microsoft表示，在此预览期间，它在此预览期间放弃了新的硬件要求，适用于6月24日之前测试过Windows Builds的那些。否则，您需要使用Microsoft的PC Health Check应用程序来查看您的系统是否兼容。
 我们不建议在您每天使用的计算机上安装这些预览，因为存在错误和未完成的功能。事实上，Microsoft有许多已知的问题它列出，这些是您应该知道的重要内容：
 任务栏不会在多个监视器上显示（将在即将到来的构建中修复）
 在将具有多个用户帐户的设备升级到Windows 11时，设置将无法启动
 Microsoft Store Install按钮可能在“一些有限的方案”中可能无法运行
note_en:
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our  ethics statement.
 Microsoft is releasing its first Windows 11 preview build today. Windows Insiders can download the Windows 11 preview ( build 22000.51) right now, which includes access to the new Start menu, multitasking features, and overhauled Microsoft Store. Unlike the  previous Windows 11 leak, this official preview also features an updated File Explorer that replaces the ribbon with a command bar to simplify file management a little more.
 Most of the Windows 11 visual changes that Microsoft revealed last week will be available in this initial preview. The new Start menu with its centered launcher-like interface is part of this build, alongside rounded corners throughout the OS and improvements to the notification center, volume flyouts, and more. If your PC has an accelerometer, the Windows 11 lock screen will also include a parallax motion effect.
   Windows 11’s new themes and dark / light mode improvements are also part of this preview, alongside the new Widgets feature. All of the new themes — Glow, Captured Motion, Sunrise, and Flow — are designed with the centered taskbar in mind, and Microsoft has coupled them with new sounds in Windows 11 as you use the OS.
 Two big Windows 11 features are missing, though:  Microsoft Teams integration and  Android apps on Windows. Both are still being developed and tested by Microsoft but will appear in later preview builds.
   This Windows 11 preview also includes Microsoft’s new Snap Groups and Snap Layouts features, to improve multitasking across a variety of screen sizes. These new Snap features build on a lot of the multitasking features that have been in Windows for years but make them easier to discover and more useful — particularly in multiple-monitor scenarios.
 Microsoft is also overhauling the Settings section of Windows 11. This preview build include changes that make it easier to navigate around and find the setting you need. Settings now has a left-hand navigation panel that persists throughout, making it quicker to switch between sections. Microsoft has built new “hero” controls at the top that offer quick access to information or settings that are relevant for each section.
   Alongside the Windows 11 preview today, Microsoft is also releasing a preview of its Office refresh for Windows 11. The updated UI includes rounded corners in Office apps to match Windows 11 and some changes to how the dark and light modes work.
 If you’re interested in testing the Windows 11 preview build, you’ll need to  enroll in the Windows Insiders program and then navigate to Settings > Update & Security > Windows Insider Program on a Windows 10 device to enable the Dev Channel and obtain Windows 11 builds.
 You’ll need a compatible machine, although Microsoft says it’s waiving its  new hardware requirements during this preview period for those who have been testing Windows builds prior to June 24th. Otherwise, you’ll need to use  Microsoft’s PC Health Check app to see if your system is compatible.
 We wouldn’t recommend installing these previews on a machine you use daily, as there will be bugs and unfinished features. In fact, Microsoft has a  number of known issues it lists, and these are the important ones you should be aware of:
 the taskbar will not be shown across multiple monitors (will be fixed in an upcoming build)
 when upgrading a device with multiple user accounts to Windows 11, Settings will fail to launch
 the Microsoft Store install button might not be functional yet in “some limited scenarios”
title: Microsoft释放第一个Windows 11预览，可供企业使用，其中包含主要更新，除了团队集成和Android应用支持
title_en: Microsoft releases the first Windows 11 preview, available to Insiders, with major updates included except Teams integration and Android app support

note:
为了提高播放商店的开发人员安全性，谷歌要求那些为Android开发的人在今年晚些时候遵守2步验证和新的身份要求。
  在登录播放控制台时，第一个要求是2步验证（2SV）。这是一种防止账户和应用劫持的方法，从而保持最终用户的安全。它遵循谷歌广泛推动鼓励2FA采用。除了您的用户名和密码外，您必须验证您是否真的使用发送到手机或物理安全密钥的提示符。
 新的Google Play开发人员账户需要在8月份启用2步验证，要求在现有的要求“今年晚些时候”。
 同时，谷歌正在将“开发人员识别要求”介绍“帮助我们更好地了解您的需求”。除了提供您的电子邮件地址和电话号码之外，还将需要以下信息：
  此信息不会公开列出，只是帮助确认您是谁并进行沟通：
 您的联系信息允许我们分享有关您应用的重要信息和更新。它还有助于我们确保每个帐户由一个具有真实联系方式创建的，这有助于我们为所有用户保证播放商店安全。
 从今天开始，开发人员可以指定其帐户类型并验证联系方式。这是可选的，但将是8月份新用户的要求。今年将要求现有账户提交。谷歌还提供以下最佳实践： 
保持联系信息激活和最新信息。我们偶尔会通过通过电子邮件发送或使用所提供的详细信息发送或调用帐户所有者来检查您的帐户是否有效，因此它们是准确的。
 考虑使用与您用来创建Google帐户的联系人电子邮件地址，特别是如果您的开发人员帐户将有多个用户或用于组织或业务。您可能希望考虑为此目的设置专用的共享收件箱，以便团队或组织中的正确的人员集可以访问这些重要消息。如果您有一个，我们会鼓励您使用自己的域中的电子邮件地址。
 组织或商业帐户的联系人电子邮件地址不应该是通用或个人电子邮件地址。确保使用与组织关联的电子邮件地址。
  您正在阅读9To5Google  - 在日复一日的日复一日地打破有关谷歌及其周围生态系统的新闻的专家。请务必查看我们的主页，以了解所有最新消息，并在Twitter，Facebook和LinkedIn上关注9to5Google，留在循环中。不知道从哪里开始？查看我们的独家故事，评论，How-TO，以及订阅我们的YouTube频道
note_en:
To improve developer security on the Play Store, Google is  requiring those that develop for Android to abide by 2-Step Verification and new identity requirements later this year.
  The first requirement is 2-Step Verification (2SV) when signing into the Play Console. This is a way to prevent account and app hijacking, thus keeping end users safe. It follows Google’s  broad push to encourage 2FA adoption. Besides your username and password, you have to verify it’s really you signing in with either a prompt sent to your phone or a  physical security key.
 New Google Play developer accounts will need to enable 2-Step Verification in August, with the requirement enforced on existing ones “later this year.”
 Meanwhile, Google is introducing “Developer identification requirements” to “help us better understand your needs.” In addition to providing your email address and phone number, the following information will also be required:
  This information will not be listed publicly, and just meant to help confirm who you are and communicate:
 Your contact information allows us to share important information and updates about your app. It also helps us make sure that every account is created by a real person with real contact details, which helps us keep the Play Store safe for all users.
 Starting today, developers can specify their account type and verify contact details. This is optional for now but will be a requirement for new users in August. Existing accounts will be required to submit this year. Google also offers the following best practices:
 Keep your contact information active and up to date. We may occasionally check if your account is active by emailing or calling the account owner using the details provided, so it is important that they are accurate.
 Consider using a contact email address different from the one that you use to create your Google account, especially if your developer account will have multiple users or is for an organization or business. You might want to consider setting up a dedicated shared inbox for this purpose so that the right set of people within your team or organization can access these important messages. We encourage you to use an email address from your own domain if you have one.
 The contact email address for an organization or business account should not be a generic or personal email address. Make sure to use an email address associated with your organization.
  You’re reading 9to5Google — experts who break news about Google and its surrounding ecosystem, day after day. Be sure to check out  our homepage for all the latest news, and follow 9to5Google on  Twitter,  Facebook, and  LinkedIn to stay in the loop. Don’t know where to start? Check out our  exclusive stories,  reviews,  how-tos, and  subscribe to our YouTube channel
title: 谷歌表示，所有播放商店开发人员帐户都需要启用2步验证，提供地址，并在今年晚些时候验证他们的联系方式
title_en: Google says all Play Store developer accounts will need to enable 2-Step Verification, provide an address, and verify their contact details later this year

note:
Apple高管在过去的隐私实践中已经在Google上拍摄了Swipes。但iPhone制造商信任谷歌足够的信任，以便在过去的一年中，在过去的一年里，它大大增加了谷歌云中的苹果用户数据的数量，根据这一事项的直接知识。
 增加了CENDES Apple作为Google存储服务最大的企业客户的状态，Dwarfing其他高调的Google客户，如Bytedance和Spotify。该人表示，截至5月中旬，苹果公司正在轨道上花费大约3 000万美元的谷歌云层储存量，这将增加2020年的大约50％。这个人说，谷歌的云单元内，员工甚至给了Apple一个代码名称，其中暗示其大小：Bigfoot。
    Apple高管在过去的隐私实践中已经在Google上拍摄了Swipes。但iPhone制造商信任谷歌足够的信任，以便在过去的一年中，在过去的一年里，它大大增加了谷歌云中的苹果用户数据的数量，根据这一事项的直接知识。增加CENDES Apple作为最大的企业客户的地位......
note_en:
Apple executives have taken swipes at Google in the past over its privacy practices. But the iPhone maker trusts Google enough so that over the past year it has dramatically increased the amount of Apple user data it stores in Google’s cloud, according to a person with direct knowledge of the matter.
 The increase cements Apple’s status as the largest corporate client for Google’s storage service, dwarfing other high-profile Google customers such as ByteDance and Spotify. As of mid-May, Apple was on track to spend around $300 million on Google cloud storage this year, which would represent an increase of roughly 50% from all of 2020, the person said. Inside Google’s cloud unit, the person said, staffers have even given Apple a code name that hints at its size: Bigfoot.
    Apple executives have taken swipes at Google in the past over its privacy practices. But the iPhone maker trusts Google enough so that over the past year it has dramatically increased the amount of Apple user data it stores in Google’s cloud, according to a person with direct knowledge of the matter. The increase cements Apple’s status as the largest corporate client for...
title: 资料来源：Apple在2021年在Google Cloud Services上花费〜300米，从2020年起高出50％，矮化百万态，Spotify等大客户
title_en: Source: Apple is on track to spend ~$300M on Google Cloud services in 2021, up roughly 50% from 2020, dwarfing ByteDance, Spotify, and other large customers
